divy15:8: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ jīvatāṁ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatāṁ keśanakhastūpā bhavanti |
divy15:9: yadā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā bhavanti, tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṁ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti, keciddhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhānyanubhavanti |
divy15:10: tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṁs tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmaraṁścittamabhiprasādayati—ityapi sa bhagavāṁstathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārithaḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ buddho bhagavāniti |
divy15:11: atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṁghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy15:12: adrākṣīdbhagavāṁstaṁ bhikṣuṁ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam |
divy15:13: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—paśyata yūyaṁ bhikṣava etaṁ bhikṣuṁ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam? evaṁ bhadanta |
divy15:14: anena bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho ’śītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā yāvatyo vālukāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni |
divy15:15: atha teṣāṁ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat—puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṁ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum, kṛtaḥ punaraśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramiti |
divy15:17: atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṁ kartumārabdhāḥ |
divy15:18: atha bhagavāṁsteṣāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—anavarāgro bhikṣavaḥ saṁsāro ’vidyānīvaraṇānāṁ sattvānāṁ tuṣṇāsamyojanānāṁ tṛṣṇārgalabaddhānāṁ dīrghamadhvānaṁ saṁdhāvatāṁ saṁsaratām |
divy15:20: āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papraccha—yaduktaṁ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti, kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gamiṣyati? nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṁ copahatiṁ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo ’ntike |
divy15:21: tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gacchanti |
divy15:22: tasmāttarhi te upālinn evaṁ śikṣitavyam, yaddagdhasthūṇāyā api cittaṁ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ, prāgeva savijñānake kāye |
